channel.title: What should I buy
channel.description:
Ok, in about 7 weeks, I will be out of school, and during the summer I will have a job.
If i get accepted, I will get paid mim. wage, folding towels, moving lawn chairs, etc,. for about 20 hours a week.
20 * 8.50 = $170 a week.
170 * 4 = $680
680 * 3 = $2040.
What should I buy with $2,000 dollars?
I was thinking a laptop, but I don't want a rip-off one, like my local retailers sell.
Was gonna buy legit software (warez is soo fucking annoying imo, glitches, etc,.)
I was thinking of upgrading my computer atm, and building my own laptop.
what do you think?

item.title: What should I buy
item.dc:creator: @R.I.P_RSC R.I.P RSC
item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

IIRC, AIDS free women are €1000-2000 in South Asia. So buy one, get her to the US and earn her back!

But on a more serious note: If you just want to spend your money, buy something to expand your hobby or start a new one. I don’t know you, so I don’t know what your interests are.

On the other hand, if you don’t mind saving, you should put your money on a bank account. If you aren’t afraid of taking risks, you can invest it. If you have enough time on your hands, you can still make a decent profit on the stock exchange.

Read full topic

item.title: What should I buy
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

  1. Buy a plane ticket to Somalia
  2. Buy groups of 4 cows
  3. Trade each group of 4 cows for an ak47
  4. Return, resell ak 47s at a higher cost, repeat till you’re wealthy/dead

item.title: What should I buy
item.dc:creator: @Wrauld Wrauld
item.description:
@Wrauld wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:19, topic:271323”][quote author=Uriko link=topic=358057.msg2734852#msg2734852 date=1238987887]
Minus all the taxes, you’ll have less than that.
[/quote]

Doesn’t really put that big of a dent in; if he’s a student of course. But then again I don’t know how the taxes work in the US (assuming he is from the US).[/quote]
Yes, I am from the USA, and if you make less then $5000 a year or something and under the age of 18, you can get a tax rebate.

Speljohan:

pub

thought taken.

item.title: What should I buy
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:

[quote=“Wrauld, post:6, topic:271323”][quote author=T4_ link=topic=358057.msg2734524#msg2734524 date=1238969808]

Was gonna buy legit software (warez is soo fucking annoying imo, glitches, etc,.)

What are you talking about?

Buy hardware.
[/quote]

Most of the time, when I download warez, like photoshop, there is always that different annoying glitch, sometimes, it dosen’t save gradients and styles, can’t save png’s anymore. etc,.

I want a laptop though T4_ too, I’ll just look at some tutorial to make a laptop.[/quote]
The reason that is fucked is not because of its Warez.
All I know that has Photoshop have a pirate version and no problem with it.
The crack I use is a simple BAT script.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @evilkingofpersia evilkingofpersia
item.description:
@evilkingofpersia wrote:

Buy a fake ID, rent a really nice car, drive it to Mexico and sell it to a drug dealer. When you return to the US from Mexico bring as much contraband as possible with you. Wash, Rinse, Repeat. Reinvest all money into light sweet crude oil futures.

http://www.wtrg.com/daily/crudeoilprice.html#Light

item.title: What should I buy
item.dc:creator: @Wrauld Wrauld
item.description:
@Wrauld wrote:

[quote=“T4_, post:9, topic:271323”][quote author=Wrauld link=topic=358057.msg2734647#msg2734647 date=1238974894]

Was gonna buy legit software (warez is soo fucking annoying imo, glitches, etc,.)

What are you talking about?

Buy hardware.

Most of the time, when I download warez, like photoshop, there is always that different annoying glitch, sometimes, it dosen’t save gradients and styles, can’t save png’s anymore. etc,.

When I get enough money, I will just ask the hardware section what should I buy with $1000 for a laptop I’m going to build.

I want a laptop though T4_ too, I’ll just look at some tutorial to make a laptop.

I’ve never encountered a key generator/cracked application that limited the program; especially in the Photoshop series - Paradox does a good job.

Why would you need a tutorial on building a laptop? You buy a frame w/ monitor, motherboard, hard drive, processor, RAM and assemble. Also, laptops suck unless you’re frequently mobile.

For trips etc,. never thought making a laptop would be easy :D, I did use paradox btw, its pisses me off
[/quote]
Paradox generator for PS is very simple: install as trial, activate by phone, insert # from generator, click generate key in PS, add that key to Paradox generator, generate, paste.

Hard to describe, but not hard to do.[/quote]

I know how to do to that. The activation works fine and everything, but like my photoshop is always screwed.

Read full topic

I’ve never encountered a key generator/cracked application that limited the program; especially in the Photoshop series - Paradox does a good job.

Why would you need a tutorial on building a laptop? You buy a frame w/ monitor, motherboard, hard drive, processor, RAM and assemble. Also, laptops suck unless you’re frequently mobile.
[/quote]
For trips etc,. never thought making a laptop would be easy :D, I did use paradox btw, its pisses me off :([/quote]
Paradox generator for PS is very simple: install as trial, activate by phone, insert # from generator, click generate key in PS, add that key to Paradox generator, generate, paste.

Hard to describe, but not hard to do.

Read full topic
